alert.note: Alert for Clark; Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 7:52PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Snow Continues to Spread Across the Area... A large area of snow, mixed with rain at times, will continue to move eastward across the area through late evening. The snow will be moderate to briefly heavy at times with localized rates of a half inch to 1 inch per hour. This may lead to reduced visibilities under a half mile and slippery travel conditions especially on bridges and overpasses. In areas of lighter snow and rain, the pavement should stay mainly wet. Additional snowfall accumulations of 1 to 2 inches are possible through 10 PM this evening. Use caution and utilize winter driving skills if traveling this evening. Please drive slowly and allow extra time to reach your destination.
